# Competitive Research Skill

## Purpose
Use external sources to avoid outdated patterns and improve product sequencing.

## Sources (priority)
1. Official vendor docs.
2. Framework release notes/changelogs.
3. Reputable engineering blogs/case studies.

## Deliverables
- What changed recently.
- What patterns are current best practice.
- Which ideas are stage-1 vs stage-2 for this product.

## Guardrails
- Prefer primary sources.
- Include source links and dates.
- Separate facts from inferences.
